name: The Click Game
description:
"click on the buttons non-stop and get your best score!"

The Click Game, is a game created in an hour, for a developer challenge. Click non-stop buttons before time runs out! whenever you click on a button the timer resets, but be careful! with each random click the game time starts to decrease, so be quick!

Updates:
1.0: Release (Current)

1.1: Leaderboard

1.2: More game modes
